title: Easy Skillet Cobblers
directions: In a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat, add the apples, sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, spices, and salt.
3, Mix to combine and stir for 5-10 minutes until the mixture starts to thicken.
Let simmer for 5 minutes on low heat.
Mix cake mix with butter pieces until crumbly.
Sprinkle the mix over the apple filling.
Bake for 45 minutes to an hour, until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: 4 cups chopped apples, such as Granny Smith or Pink Lady
½ cup butter, cut into slices
4 cups fresh or frozen pitted cherries
½ cup butter, cut into slices
½ cup butter, cut into slices
½ cup butter, cut into slices
